options.install: Install tools packages to a working directory

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Path to solution, packages.config, or project.json file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the Visual Studio solution file, packages.config, or project.json that specifies the required packages.

options.nugetConfig: Use feeds specified in my NuGet.Config

inputs.name: nugetConfigPath
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.config
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the NuGet.config file that specifies which feeds to restore packages from.

inputs.name: feed
inputs.label: Feed (package source)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The feed to install packages from.

inputs.name: packageId
inputs.label: Package to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the package to install.

inputs.name: packageVersion
inputs.label: Version to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the provided package ID to install.

inputs.name: noCache
inputs.label: Disable local cache
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prevent NuGet from using the local package cache.

inputs.name: destinationDirectory
inputs.label: Destination directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where packages are restored or installed; defaults to the working directory.
